comment: Professor McClincy is the BEST. She is a project based professor, she encourages you get active on the campus by assigning two papers about an event on campus. 2 tests (one online and one in the classroom), final was a course reflection. Read the powerpoints and come to class and its an easy A.

She was an excellent teacher to have for my first year. It was an excellent class and even when I was hopping mad from my previous class I was always able to come into her classroom and relax. It was a simple class you just had to pay attention and show up.
